一般称为精算学生(Actuarial Student)，精算分析员(Actuarial Analyst)，助理精算人员(Actuarial Assistant) 必须在规定的时间内通过.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (originally denoting a clerk or registrar of a court): from Latin actuarius 'bookkeeper', from actus (see act)The current sense dates from the mid 19th cent

entry.tran: 保险精算师;保险业务计算员
entry.def: An actuary is a person who is employed by insurance companies to calculate how much they should charge their clients for insurance.

means.word_mean: 1. someone versed in the collection and interpretation of numerical data (especially someone who uses statistics to calculate insurance premiums)
